description: Tall, brown skinned stud Devon Felix cannot seem to resist his urges and suddenly finds himself cheating on his girlfriend.   What makes this especially scandalous is not what he's doing, but who he's doing it with.  The moment Devon met his girlfriend's brother Derek Reed he just knew that one day he's going to have to have his ass.  Derek swallows Devon's cock and rides the muscular young stud to show him that only a man can really please another man.
title: My Girlfriends Brother
